name: MISSINGOINGONE
description:
STORY

MISSINGOINGONE : You wake up to find everybody is missing - every single person your local town has disappeared without a trace - the only thing that remains is your sanity - and that is almost gone too - find the people - don't get lonely and see if you can find any indication of life!

FEATURES

3D Environment

Hilarious Commentary on the gaming world  

Large Open Map

Sprawling Streets 

'MISSINGOINGONE' REVIEWS:

"What a game" - A Caveman 

"I love it! BEST GAME 10/10 !! EVERYONE NEEDS TO BUY THIS GAME! RIGHT NOW!" - The Developer - MISSINGOINGONE

"Huh? 3D? That's a big step for RoomsForRockets and Dawooskhe Games!" - Our PR team

Conclusion

GIVE US MONEEEEEEEEEEEEY!

Enjoy our game :)
